cloudfiles_container_linked: A user linked a Cloud Files container to a project
cloudfiles_container_unlinked: A user unselected a Cloud Files container in a project
cloudfiles_file_added: A user added a file to a Cloud Files container in a project
cloudfiles_file_removed: A user removed a file in a Cloud Files container in a project
cloudfiles_file_updated: A user updated a file in a Cloud Files container in a project
cloudfiles_folder_created: A user created a folder in a Cloud Files in a project
cloudfiles_node_authorized: A user authorized the Cloud Files add-on for a project
cloudfiles_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the Cloud Files add-on for a project
cloudfiles_node_deauthorized_no_user: Cloud Files add-on for a project deauthorized
